attributes.action: Re-instate full BBC coverage for F1 from the end of this year.
attributes.additional_details:
The BBC has announced that they are no longer covering all F1 races from the end of the current season. This means that it is no longer available free to air in breach of the Concorde agreement, and the BBC's existing contract which doesn't expire until 2013.

The government must act immediately to make sure that the BBC honour their existing contract, the Concorde agreement and the BBC's pledge in respect of key sporting events remaining free to air and re-instate live and full coverage of F1 coverage.
